categories: Category:Battles of the Melida/Daan Civil War

nodes.text: The Tenth War, also known as the Tenth Battle of Zehava, was a battle of the Melida/Daan Civil War on the planet of Melida/Daan that occurred at some point before 94 BBY. It resulted in underground burial vaults being constructed in the city of Zehava. It was considered the bloodiest battle fought for control of the city.
